thread.section_title: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance | calcas.com
thread.title: Gordon Taiariol
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Gordon Taiariol

author: Gordon Taiariol
title: Gordon Taiariol
text:
I have been with California Casualty for many years. Thankfully, I have had but a few claims in that time.
That being said, every experience I have had has been positive. Whether renewing or updating a policy, the service is prompt and polite.
The one time I had to make a claim on my homeowners, Kristine, the rep that handled my problem was FANTASTIC. She stayed in contact through the entire stressful ordeal.
I have been solicited by several other companies, but based on my experiences, I have no plan to leave.
